about.me: Hosting secure Cardano staking is our mission. Visit our page to know more about us.
about.server: We operate only energy-efficient servers on a 100% renewable electricity basis. To build the green blockchain of today and tomorrow.
about.company: We have more than 10 years of experience in the IT security domain and a clear focus on security and uptime. We also focus on sustainability in our node infrastructure. In every step we strive to be as energy-efficient as possible while providing 99%+ uptime in our staking operations.
